name: 10 Mississippi
description: 10 Mississippi is a stop motion game about a day’s routine, played over and over and over and over again. 10 Mississippi plays with the taboo of film envy in games while browsing through life’s interstitial moments - perusing through the fridge or waiting during the morning commute or composing an email to an old friend. 10 Mississippi is a game of uncomfortable, creeping intimacy.
